short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans up your Facebook feed by removing shares and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your Facebook feed just about your friends and what they're up to by installing TidyFeed.

- Hide shared posts.
- Hide posts containing words you don't like.
- Hide posts from apps letting you what movie your friend is watching, how they exercise more than you, etc.
- Hide meta-posts about friends getting tagged, mentioned, etc.
- Hide lots of other stuff.

if you want to see what's hidden, just click the TidyFeed button and they'll magically reappear.
